examples: Don't keep us in suspense?did you get the job or not?
Don't look at the end of the book yet?you'll break the suspense.
She couldn't bear the suspense a moment longer.
(informal) I don't get the results till next week, and the suspense is killing me.
They were kept in suspense about their possibility of joining the expedition for several weeks.
I suffered agonies of suspense in silence.
